Struct template make_scaled_unit

boost::units::make_scaled_unit

Synopsis

template<typename Unit, typename Scale> 
struct make_scaled_unit {
  // types
  typedef make_scaled_unit< typename reduce_unit< Unit >::type, Scale >::type type;
};
